distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from module_manage
order by ${orderByClause}

module_name = #{record.moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_content_name = #{record.moduleContentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update module_manage set module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_content_name = #{moduleContentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_project_code = #{moduleProjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, env_id = #{envId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, env_code = #{envCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_person = #{chargePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_telephone = #{chargeTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offical_charge_person = #{officalChargePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offical_charge_telephone = #{officalChargeTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate_id = #{certificateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, center_id = #{centerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, module_type = #{moduleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sh_path = #{shPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, svn_auto_url = #{svnAutoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_yw = #{remarkYw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_bak = #{remarkBak,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS moduleId, a.module_name AS moduleName, a.module_content_name AS moduleContentName, a.certificate_id AS certificateId, a.center_id AS centerId, a.module_project_code AS moduleProjectCode, b.center_name AS centerName, b.center_code AS centerCode, a.module_type AS moduleType, b.center_path AS centerPath, a.env_id AS envId, c.env_name AS mark, a.charge_person AS chargePerson, a.charge_telephone AS chargeTelephone, c.region_name AS regionName, a.offical_charge_person AS officalChargePerson, a.offical_charge_telephone AS officalChargeTelephone, a.sh_path AS shPath, a.svn_auto_url AS svnAutoUrl, b.child_center_name AS childCenterName, b.id AS centerId, b.child_center_content_name AS childCenterContentName FROM module_manage a LEFT JOIN module_center b ON a.center_id = b.id LEFT JOIN module_env c ON c.id = a.env_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND b.is_deleted = 0 AND a.id = #{module_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.module_name AS moduleName, a.id AS id from module_manage a left join module_job b on a.id = b.module_id where a.center_id = #{centerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND b.is_delete = 0 AND a.is_delete = 0;

SELECT a.module_name AS moduleName, a.id AS moduleId, b.child_center_name AS childCenterName, b.center_name as centerName, a.mark AS envName, d.yaml_name AS yamlName, a.charge_person AS chargePerson, a.charge_telephone AS chargeTelephone, a.offical_charge_person AS officalChargePerson, a.offical_charge_telephone AS officalChargeTelephone, a.create_time AS createTime, a.remark AS remark, a.remark_yw AS ywRemark FROM module_manage a INNER JOIN module_center b ON a.center_id = b.id LEFT JOIN module_deploy c ON a.id = c.module_id LEFT JOIN module_deploy_yaml d ON c.id = d.deploy_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND b.is_deleted = 0 AND c.is_delete = 0 AND d.is_online_yaml = 1 AND a.env_id = #{envId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
FROM module_manage WHERE env_id = 30 AND is_delete = 0 AND module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
